Text:
audio is out of whack, then disappears at the end.
Do not download.

Audio is actually seemingly fine until the last four or so minutes where it completely "disappears." Tested on VLC Media Player. I would probably try a different torrent if you NEED to hear the last four minutes of the episode. From what I saw, you'll be missing a bit of dialogue if you don't.
Actually, scratch that. The original audio seems to be messed up. My apologies to the torrent uploader. Hopefully next week's episode will cover some of what couldn't be heard.
WTF? No one does .xvid anymore? Seriously considering going to another site at this point. I want to download quick and watch and then delete not wait all day for a crystal clear video.
